experience: You and Andrew both know Kyle Burnett, Eric Keosky-Smith, and 113 others
So excited that my PASSION is my CAREER!  Learn more about how I help teach people how to network smart for business ROI at karimirabal.com
Bolste Named as an Business Social Software Innovator – Aragon Research - Bolste | Collaboration, Business and Video Chat, File Sharing & Task Management Software
This week I was at Singapore airline's highly anticipated launch of their new cabin 'space made personal'  for their  Airbus A380 fleet.

This 4 year, 850M program includes first class suites with our 32-inch full HD monitor, a full-sized personal wardrobe, customised handbag stowage compartment, and a feature wall with mood lighting. We worked with Singapore to launch myKrisWorld, a personalised, first of its kind, IFE experience. When Kris Flyers 'login to their seat' they receive content recommendations based on their preferences and viewing history. Features include being able to bookmark and resume content, as well as customise and save preferences for subsequent flights including seat preferences,  'monitor wallpaper,' and first class suite cabin lighting.

This is where digital meets physical(from the physical world of our personal senses and tastes to the digital world where data is synthesized and analytics drive deeper insight) This ground breaking initiative is the beginning of the next generation of inflight experience.  http://bit.ly/2iYsH3F   https://lnkd.in/gq3gUGt
The Panasonic Avionics Corporation team on-site today: CTO David Bartlett, CEO Hideo Nakano, Andy Fellows, Jon Norris and Soon Teck Ng.

●	Turned around Product and Development leadership of a failed product organization. ●	Propelled the reconfiguration of the entire Bolste employee organization.  Identified strengths and weaknesses, reassigned employees, hired new at all levels, established process and aligned employees to clear corporate goals. ●	Lead the development of Bolste 3.0 SaaS products (Web Platform, Admin App, iOS App, and Android App)  which won two national awards:  Hot Vendor 2016 Award and Lead Innovator Award in Social Collaboration / Digital Work Hub category.●	Researched market, worked with Bolste executives, Board, customers and prospects as well as other stakeholders to develop and continually validate the Bolste platform road map.Led team in Developing internationally recognized,  award winning, world class Digital Work Hub platform.  Transformed Bolste into  a world class product organization from scratch.  Bolste™ is a new digital work hub, (productivity platform) designed to improve interactions, streamline workflow, improve productivity,  and help companies grow. The technology keeps everyone connected and informed across all roles or locations, and is the #1 all-in-one for that unites employees, consultants, customers, vendors, and teams that need to get on the same page—to get more done and use their time wisely (www.bolste.com)
8723 Via De Commercio Suite B101, Scottsdale, AZ 85258

Integrating Predictive Technologies that accelerate our clients a step ahead of the competition.”Our clients :- Transform data into actionable information, and ultimately into corporate wisdom- Understand complex relationships and how to monitize them     - Value a trusted business/technology resource- Need to meet a Budget We coined the term PredictiveIT several years ago.  Our services are innovative and steeped in industry best practices.  Learn from us while we turn your data into dollars
Business Intelligence / Analytics Architect / Product Manager/

Architected and implemented interactive global supply chain analytical products utilizing sophisticated Data Warehouse 42Bil trans /over 1,000 data sources.Lead team - design, development and delivery 40+ (900+ distinct tools) Global supply chain SaaS analytics products for the largest companies in the world in Tech, Mfg, and Pharma.Cloud Deployment - AWS  delivery reducing CAPX expense and increasing velocity of deliverables.Agile Methodology leadership/Scrum Master. Guided team through successful transition from waterfall to Agile scrum methodology.Implemented disciplined controls for the production release of analytics products. Added velocity. Release of analytics products resulting in a multi-million dollar recurring contract with a large pharmaceutical company.  Developed streamlined Data Management Strategy allowing faster refresh of data.Big Data deployment.  2015 - Over 100 MM freight bills / over $13 B freight trans,  forty+ currencies and 100 countries for global customers from offices in the Glasgow UK, Singapore, Cebu, Philippines, Costa Rica, and Scottsdale, AZ.Vertical Development.  Pharma: Pfizer, GSK, Merck, Sanofi, etc..  Technology: Apple, HP, Texas Instruments, etc. Manufacturing: Stryker, Emerson, GE, etc.Business Analysis - Developed tools and templates.  Facilitated creation of user stories and detailed requirements for analytics and analytical products.Lead implementation of advanced ETL (Extract, Transform and load) strategies to increase platform reliability, sustainability and scalability.Technology/Method: Tableau 8- 9X, Tableau Server, SQL, SSRS, SSIS, KNIME, MySQL, R,  ElasticSearch, Kibana, Product Mgr, Development Mgr, Scrum, Agile, data cleansing, data science, business intelligence, business analysis, Master Data Mgmt., adv visualizations, DW  architecture.

WayPoint provides a full range of strategic and tactical data warehousing, data management, Analytics and information technology services.  Lead solution engagements: Healthcare: Compliance and business process automation.  Manufacturing: Business Intelligence, Doc. Management and business process automation. summary: Andrew Bourne is a technology leader, serial entrepreneur, and revenue driver.  Andrew's passion is in building and leading high performing teams through difficult technical projects to successful results.  He is currently the CPO (Chief Product Officer) of Bolste: A digital work hub focused on optimizing human interactions.   In 18 months at the helm Andrew led his team to release Bolste 3.0, a world class and internationally award winning SaaS application.  Andrew travelled internationally to work closely with large customers such as British Petroleum, Tesco, SAS, GE, among others to ensure product acceptance in the marketplace.  Hi deep technical background and business acumen allows him to seamlessly traverse complex projects to high market valueAs an entrepreneur, Andrew started his first Technology venture: ITIC, Inc. in Denver CO. In 5 years as CEO, he grew y/y revenues 100%  with three locations Denver, Phoenix & Seattle.  He led teams in developing business intelligence analytics solutions for internationally recognized companies such as: Honeywell, ING, Citibank, Discount Tires, Coors, Lipper Analytical, Apple, and Standard and Poors, among others. Andrew sold ITIC to Idea Integration,  a division of MODIS, Inc., a multi-billion dollar technology consulting firm. Relocating to Scottsdale in 2002, Andrew founded WayPoint Technologies, his second multi-million dollar success. WayPoint was a recognized leader in customer analytics and workflow software solutions for healthcare, manufacturing and retail.  Andrew holds a B.S. in Finance and Accounting from the University of Colorado and an M.B.A. from George Washington University in Washington D.C.
name: Andrew Bourne
title: Chief Technology Officer at Bolste™
